description.en: The Bgogo Exchange is proud to announce its new Bgogo Trading (BGT) index token, for quantitative trading in the secondary market. BGT will consist of a mixed package of digital assets exclusively selected by a professional team specializing in trading operations on the secondary market. The special team responsible for trading operations is well versed in quantitative, arbitrage, high and low frequency strategies. BGT gives users access to the benefits of professional trading strategies with ease, convenience, and limited personal digital asset investment
